body_html: It's a custom op with two implementations - OpenMP and Eigen. OpenMP is default. The code is at https://github.com/ska-sa/montblanc/blob/master/montblanc/impl/rime/tensorflow/rime_ops/phase_op_cpu.h. Performance gain from using OpenMP is impressive. Thanks for the pointer.
body_text: It's a custom op with two implementations - OpenMP and Eigen. OpenMP is default.   The code is at https://github.com/ska-sa/montblanc/blob/master/montblanc/impl/rime/tensorflow/rime_ops/phase_op_cpu.h.  Performance gain from using OpenMP is impressive. Thanks for the pointer.
body: It's a custom op with two implementations - OpenMP and Eigen. OpenMP is default.   The code is at https://github.com/ska-sa/montblanc/blob/master/montblanc/impl/rime/tensorflow/rime_ops/phase_op_cpu.h.  Performance gain from using OpenMP is impressive. Thanks for the pointer.
